Guys,

I know that I have seen something about this, but I could not find it
anywhere.  What I am looking for is code that will search the classpath for
all the available tests.  If it could also execute the tests that would be
great.

I do know that this is available as an ANT task, but it is not possible at
this time to add that into our ANT build process.

Thanks in advance,

Ron
